page.title: 16HOUSING FORRES WEST
page.content: In this square there are two {housing {estates}namely Pilmuir and Thornhill ,both owned by the council.Pilmuir was built in 1 972 with Thornhill built more recently.There is only one village in this area.It is called { {Kintessack}and has a population of around 20.Nearby there is an {outdoor {centre }called Earnhill.There are seven {farms}in the area.They include {Middlefield},{Lingieston Invererne},{ {Grangreen},and {Greeshop}. The houses at Pilmuir are built of bricks with timber frames and are semi-detached and bungalows.Pilmuir houses use coal fires and gas central heating while Thornhill houses are all centrally heated.In Kintessack all the houses are semi-detached bungalows with a variety of heating systems.
